entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
